title: Video game consumer market value worldwide 2011 - 2021 , by distribution
summary: Overall DLC market is gradually increasing, Package market is roughly constant,  throughout the Year
The ranking of the lines from topmost to botommmost is as follows: 1. Package market, and lastly, 2. DLC market.
Package market reported the lowest Value in billion USD about 8.4 in Year 2021
The difference of Value in billion USD between DLC market and Package market is greater at Year 2021 compared to the Year 2016.
min_summary: Overall DLC market is gradually increasing, Package market is roughly constant,  throughout the Year
mid_summary: Overall DLC market is gradually increasing, Package market is roughly constant,  throughout the Year
max_summary: Overall DLC market is gradually increasing, Package market is roughly constant,  throughout the Year
The minimum Value in billion USD about 8.4, occured at 2021 by Package market.
The greatest difference of Value in billion USD between DLC market and Package market occurs at Year 2020 and the smallest difference occurs at 2016.
